QuestData.Title: Return to the Vindicaar
QuestData.Description: That pit lord won't trouble our new allies any longer.$b$b<Turalyon's brow furrows.>$b$bUntil another takes its place, at least. If there's one thing I've learned in our endless war against the Legion, it's to savor victories as you find them.$b$bCome, let us take a moment to regroup back at your vessel. Alleria and I have been waiting a long time for a reunion with our son.
QuestData.RewardText: Our absence has wounded Arator. We knew it would. But we had to know that he was safe while we fought the Legion.$b$bNow that we are reunited, I will not let us be separated again.
